CheckTitle: Ensure Elasticache Elasticache Redis replication groups under version 6.0 have Redis OSS AUTH Enabled.
CheckType: AWS Foundational Security Best Practices v1.0.0
Description: Ensure Elasticache Redis cache cluster has Multi-AZ enabled.
Risk: Without Redis AUTH enabled, your ElastiCache (Redis) instance is vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential data breaches.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Redis AUTH to require authentication before accessing your Redis instance, and for Redis 6.0 and later, consider implementing Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for enhanced security.
